title: Instant Price Calculator page with instant estimate and WhatsApp CTA

requirements.summary: Add a new /instant-price-calculator route and page rendered within the existing SiteLayout.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to /instant-price-calculator renders a new page titled “Instant Price Calculator”.
The new page uses the existing layout (TopNav and SiteFooter) and does not break existing routes (/ /about /services /contact).

file_operations.description: Create the new Instant Price Calculator page component that will be mounted by the router inside the existing SiteLayout (no layout changes needed).
Register a new TanStack Router route for /instant-price-calculator and add it to the route tree so it renders within the existing root route (SiteLayout + Outlet).

requirements.summary: Add navigation links for the new page in TopNav and SiteFooter with consistent styling and active-link behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Top navigation includes a visible link labeled “Instant Price Calculator” that navigates to /instant-price-calculator.
Footer navigation includes a visible link labeled “Instant Price Calculator” that navigates to /instant-price-calculator.
Active-link styling works for the new route the same way it does for the existing pages.

file_operations.description: Add an “Instant Price Calculator” entry to the existing navLinks array so it appears in both desktop and mobile menus, inheriting the currentPath-based active styling behavior.
Add an “Instant Price Calculator” entry to the footer navLinks list, keeping styling consistent with existing footer navigation links.

requirements.summary: Build the page UI with a clean calculator section containing exactly two dropdowns with specified labels and options.
acceptanceCriteria: The page shows two dropdown inputs labeled “Service Type” and “Work Level” with the exact option text specified.
The layout is responsive and consistent with existing page spacing/typography (similar container widths and section padding used across the site).

file_operations.description: Implement the calculator UI section using existing site spacing patterns (container, section padding) and render exactly two dropdowns: “Service Type” (PPT Making, Website Help, Document / Notes Work) and “Work Level” (Basic, Medium, Advanced).

requirements.summary: Implement instant estimated-price calculation with centralized, easy-to-edit pricing configuration.
acceptanceCriteria: Changing either dropdown updates the displayed estimate immediately.
If one or both dropdowns are not selected yet, the price area shows a neutral placeholder state (no estimate).
Pricing values are centralized in a single configuration object so a developer can update prices without touching UI markup.

file_operations.description: Create a single, centralized pricing configuration (e.g., a price matrix keyed by Service Type and Work Level) and export helper(s) to retrieve an estimate without embedding pricing values in UI markup.

Wire dropdown state to instant estimate rendering (no submit button), showing a neutral placeholder when selections are incomplete and showing the estimate immediately once both selections are chosen; source pricing via the centralized pricing configuration.

requirements.summary: Show the note text exactly near the estimate inside the calculator section.
acceptanceCriteria: The note is visible on the page and matches the exact text and punctuation provided.

file_operations.description: Add the note text exactly as: “Final price may vary based on requirements” within the calculator section near the estimate display.

requirements.summary: Add a Contact / WhatsApp button that opens the existing WhatsApp link in a new tab.
acceptanceCriteria: A button labeled “Contact / WhatsApp” appears below the price display.
Clicking the button opens https://wa.me/918855003190 in a new tab (target=_blank) with appropriate rel attributes.

file_operations.description: Add a “Contact / WhatsApp” button below the estimate area that links to https://wa.me/918855003190 with target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer", styled consistently with existing CTA buttons.

requirements.summary: Add SEO metadata via the existing SEO hook and ensure a single primary H1 heading.
acceptanceCriteria: The document title is set to an SEO-friendly value including “Instant Price Calculator” and “Digital Pro Hub”.
The page includes exactly one H1 heading: “Instant Price Calculator”.

file_operations.description: Use the existing useSeo hook to set page title and meta description, and render exactly one H1 heading with the exact text “Instant Price Calculator”.

requirements.summary: Limit changes to adding the new page and required navigation entries; avoid modifying existing page content and keep implementation frontend-only.
acceptanceCriteria: Home, About, Services, and Contact page content remains unchanged aside from any unavoidable shared navigation link additions.
No backend code changes are introduced for this feature.

file_operations.description: Constrain routing changes to only adding the new /instant-price-calculator route; do not alter existing route components or their content.
Limit shared layout changes to adding the new navigation link entry only; do not change other navigation behavior or styling beyond what is necessary for the new link.
Limit shared layout changes to adding the new footer navigation link entry only; do not change existing footer content beyond what is necessary for the new link.
